scripts.cyo: npm run clean-reports | cross-env NODE_PATH=cypress cypress open --env configFile=qa1
scripts.cyr: npm run clean-reports | cross-env NODE_PATH=cypress cypress run --env configFile=qa1
scripts.cy:tags: npm run clean-reports | cross-env NODE_PATH=.bin cypress-tags run -e
scripts.cy:run:regression: npm run cy:tags -- TAGS="(not @waitBugFix) and @regressao" --reporter cypress-multi-reporters --reporter-options configFile=reporter-config.json --env configFile=qa1
scripts.cy:run:smoke: npm run cy:tags -- TAGS="@smoke" --reporter cypress-multi-reporters --reporter-options configFile=reporter-config.json
scripts.fix-screenshots: npm run move-screenshots && npm run rename-files
scripts.after:tests: npm run fix-screenshots && npm run merge-report && npm run generate-report
